Text: FW Updated contact sheet Cc please forward this Revised Contact Sheet ie my new Pager Number to the appropriate parties in you group that are not on the email distirbution list Thanks Trey Original Message From Maillet Lisa Sent Monday May AM To ANP CO TEAM MIDLOTHIAN TEAM Subject Updated contact sheet Midlothian Fuel Supply Contactxls Midlothian Fuel Supply Contactxls
FYI New Pager Number No reply necessary I have a new pager number It does NOT require a Pin Please note the new number and make changes to contacts sheets if necessary Old Pin New Thanks Trey

Transaction Confirmation Sheets Cc Would you please forward to Lisa Maillet Fax a copy of the Transaction Confirmation sheet regarding the gas MMBtu at LSP interconnect with OasisWaha and MMBtu at LSP interconnect with PGE NTP Maypearl MELP as limited agent for ABB Alstom Power Inc purchased from Houston Pipe Line this past Wednesday Thanks Trey

DuringAfter Hours Contact Information Cc Lisa Maillet and my contact information Would one of you over the next few days email back with the correct contact information business hour and after hours so we can have on hand in preparation for gas flows Thanks Trey Lisa Maillet Work Home Mobile Trey Christensen Work Home Pager Pin Mobile

Midlothian First Nominations Cc As I mentioned earlier Lisa Hassold PGE clarified that the PGE Delivery Point is for the Maypearl Interconnect with Lone Star Pipeline rather than the other PGE NTP inch interconnect at Maypearl with TUFCOs Old Ocean Line Again thank you all for your help in the first nominations Lone Star North Line and Lone Star South Line that Midlothian Energy Limited Partnership as limited agent for ABB Asltom Power Inc has made for testing purposes at the Midlothian power plant Thanks Trey Christensen PS Attached FYI is a PowerPoint slide on the Midlothian gas pipeline and meter station layout MidlothianGasTranspLayoutppt MidlothianGasTranspLayoutppt

Contact name for executing GISB agreement Cc Darren I called this afternoon but you were out I hope all is well with you with respect to the recent events Would you please call me regarding the following two matters I am looking for a contact name and number for the person at Enron that can help us get a GISB agreement in place Our company went through a large bank financing and we are going to be conducting commercial operations under the entity known as ANP Funding I LLC Therefore we would like to set up a GISB agreement between Enron and ANP Funding I LLC Becky Kalmick works with me and she is responsible for executing the GISB agreement Would you please let me know who we can speak with regarding the agreement Also would you please give your contact heads up as to what we want to do Please note that I am dealing with Mary Cook in your company regarding the execution of an ISDA agreement Becky Kalmick Work Email I would like to talk with you about the Hays Power Plant that connected to Oasis Pipe Line and El Paso Texas Pipeline We have firm transport on Oasis from either Waha Katy or MidState Thanks Trey
